thread.title: Brittany Waggoner

author: Brittany Waggoner
title: Brittany Waggoner
text: I was browsing the internet for North Face jackets for my gf and I. I don't remember how I happened upon this shop, what link I clicked that brought me here, or if Jesus himself whispered in my ear and told me to go to this site. Holy heck! I'm glad I did! I found some cool freaking jackets for the low! Like, 2 for under $100 LOW!! What in the entire f'word! Never in this lifetime have I been blessed to catch deals that jomashop offers. I really don't wanna tell people about it; ONLY because I don't want them ordering the same thing I was gonna order when I got paid and it be sold out. But I have too! I can't keep this awesomeness to myself!!
